title.content-text: 9.3.4 Troubleshooting Radio Problems in a W LAN

brief.content-text:
Two Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image

The diagram depicts a screen capture of the G U I Interface used on a Linksys WRT300N Wireless Device. The Wireless, Basic Wireless Settings tab is selected, and the following settings are configured.

Network Mode: Mixed
Network Name (SSID): cisco
Radio Band: Auto
Wide Channel: Auto
Standard Channel: Auto
SSID Broadcast: Enabled
